title: Birth of Magic
description: “You belong to me. You’ll regret ever thinking you could get away.”When Kari is orphaned at fifteen, desperation drives her to work at a brothel run by Roza and Yolin, a cruel madam and her husband.There, Kari forges bonds with another woman and a young handyman. But friendship and fine dresses can’t veil the despair of her grim new life.Knowing Yolin’s savagery toward runaways, Kari doesn’t dare escape—until an unexpected pregnancy compels her to try. She hides in the forest, where a mysterious magical force shields her from Yolin’s pursuit.When she’s most vulnerable, Kari’s supernatural protection disappears. Yolin attacks, and she must fight for her life, her dignity, and her child.But Roza and Yolin are ruthless manipulators. And all Kari’s furious strength may not be enough to defeat them.
author: Carol Beth Anderson
